message: Since I'll only have <1 week between my final return to the NYC area and my departure from it :(
I'll be at Pycon the 8th-16th, i.e. the entire thing :)
Beeeeeerrr
Definitely beer!  I hope that beer joint that was two blocks away still exist.  Anyone remember the name?
@bob_hancock Max Lager's? Pretty sure it's still there. And yes, beeeer :D
Do you prefer Thursday, Friday, Saturday nigfht--or all three?
Right now I don't think I have a preference :)
Also, I'm already here in Atlanta, for anybody coming out prior to Thursday :)
Let's aim for Thursday.  Everyone here agree? I'll post details once I arrive.  I should get to the hotel around 5:00 on Thursday.
I'm supposed to land around 6PM on Thursday so I'll be happy to join what ever's happening around 7 or 8
I'm coming in tonight to attend a tutorial in the morning, and hopefully see some of the city in the afternoon.
I'm around, just let me know when/where.
I'm going to some BOF sessions Fri/Sat, so Thursday is probably best now.
If anybody can't make that and won't be at the Chef (Fri) and TiP (Sat) openspaces, just ping me and we can meet up some other time :)

Darn ... I will be missing the first day ... I get in at 8:15am on Saturday. I'd love to get to the keynote at 9am. Any suggestions on fast transport? I'm debating between rental car, cab and MARTA. Can't wait for PyCon!!!
MARTA's not bad and goes straight to the convention complex. no idea whether it is any faster than a car
but it was only about a 20-30m ride
Does 8:00 on Thursday at Max's sound good?  We can meet in the lobby at 7:45.  I'll post the exact meeting spot when I arrive tomorrow.
That works for me.
Tonight at 7:45 by the chairs across from the Concierge desk bordering the elevators.  Bring your friends.
